DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: I hope you've harvested the wheat.

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: But don't relax, I have enough ideas for what I can ask of you.

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: And yes, take these seeds. They will help you.

DialogueLines.Title: Inception
DialogueLines.Content: And be careful at night, okay?
